shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=basstime  = basstime + bass*0.03;
per_frame_2=q1 = basstime*0.1;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=
per_pixel_1=zoom = 1;
per_pixel_2=rot = 0;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_4=`    ret = ret*0.2; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_5=`}
comp_1=`
comp_2=`shader_body
comp_3=`{
comp_4=`  float dist = sqrt(pow(uv.x-0.5,2) + pow(uv.y-0.5,2));
comp_5=`  float2 cords = float2( (uv.x-0.5) *   (sin(dist - q1 + 0.5)*4),
comp_6=`                           (uv.y-0.5) * (sin(dist - q1 + 0.5)*4));
comp_7=`  //perlin noise
comp_8=`  float3 final_noise = float3(0,0,0);
comp_9=`  float3 uvx = float3(cords.x  , cords.y, 2 + q1*0.5 );  
comp_10=`  for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
comp_11=`      final_noise +=(1.0/pow(2,i))*(tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, uvx*pow(2,i))*2-1);
comp_12=`
comp_13=`   // Remove the sign from the noise and prep 
comp_14=`   // it for cloud rendering
comp_15=`   ret = ((final_noise+0.15)*2).xyz*0.75;
comp_16=`   ret *= lum(ret)*(ret)*40; 
comp_17=`   ret = 1 - ret*lum(ret);
comp_18=`}
